list.notes: Also known as my day job. This is my fork of the main repo.

list.name: Peculiar Monster

list.name: Hyper Dark Sublime
list.desc: Hyper Terminal theme inspired by the Atom One Dark (Vivid) theme.
list.notes: Look, I'm old. I can't do super high contrast themes--my eyes can't deal.

list.name: Dark Sublime Syntax
list.desc: A lower contrast dark Atom syntax theme.
list.notes: Since Atom is being sunset at the end of 2022, I'm no longer updating this theme.
